review: I use to loved this game but they've almost completely ruined it now. Iv lost trust in Blizzard and Overwatch. Put so much time into this game and I just don't have interest in playing it unless with friends. There's pretty much no progression, skins that were free now cost money, no way to realistically obtain skins for free, hero balance in this game is actually bad and the only reason it seems good now is because they neglected old Overwatch for 2 years before deleting it to make this mess. They basically pulled a Fall guys and took a really awesome game that was a blast to play for hours on end and just make it a scummy cash grab pile of shit that you could feel stuck into playing because you already invested so much into the game. Most importantly they removed the pve mode of the game which was the entire point of Overwatch 2 and they just scrapped it. The only good thing they've done with this game since it came out was put it on steam. I hate the battle-net launcher and love steam and I think they made a great decision putting it on here and I wish more company's would just put their games on steam because more often then not I go without playing the game because of the different launcher. As of now battle-net was the only other game launcher I had besides steam and now I can finally delete it. Thank you blizzard for this genuinely. Maybe someday they could fix the problems with this game and bring back what made people love the game so much but with blizzard becoming what it is now, My hopes are low.

Ğ˜Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€ÑƒÑ Ñ ĞºÑƒĞ¿Ğ¸Ğ» Ğ·Ğ° 999Ñ€ Ğ² 2017Ğ³ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ Ğ±Ñ‹Ğ»Ğ° Ğ½ĞµĞ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿Ğ½Ğ°, Ñ‚.Ğº Ğ·Ğ°Ğ´Ğ½ĞµĞ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Activision-Blizzard Ğ·Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¾Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒĞ·ĞºÑƒ Ğ¸Ğ· Ğ Ğ¤ Ğ¸ Ğ Ğ‘
I think they forgot this game existed and then said "oh dang" Let's pull a Destiny 2!

Played for many years, started in season 8. I played the game at a really high level, peaking rank 127 NA back in overwatch 1, when the game was actually good. Ow2 to me was still a playable game, but it lost soul and depth with the removal of a tank. Now it just felt like an ultra fast passed "brain off" version of its previous self. Despite that, they failed to make the new "game" appeal to casual and competitive players alike. Respect to the people who still believe in ow, but I lost 3 years ago personally. Sad to see. For a completely fresh player, you can probably get on and have some quick fun since it's free, but in terms of long term playability and "a game to stick to" it's not good. The company does not respect the consumers time nor money. Good memories from the good days boys. GG.

ì™„ì „ ì—‰ë§ì´ì˜ˆìš”. ì§„ì§œ ì—‰ë§ì´ì˜ˆìš”. ì´ë ‡ê²Œ ì“°ë ˆê¸° ê°™ì€ ê²Œì„ì„ í•´ë³¸ ì ì´ ì—†ì–´ìš”

Although I will be trying whatever is left of the PvE can't say I will pick the game back up at this current time, what at first was a good idea to remove 1 tank turned into a unfun game of punching bag where if your the tank, your the punching bag.

DPS has the most variety but that's because they are 75% of the roster.

Support is as fun as DPS with the down side of having not many to choose from making the role stale after a while.

The battle pass does little to excite me outside of the mythics skin most of the time, with many cosmetics being horribly over priced ranging from 10-20 bucks for 1 skin which sucks if the cool skin you like turns out to be 20 bucks.

Balance changes are back and forth half the time being changes that aren't all that impactful to changes that are so out of left field they get reverted or overly nerfed next patch.

As a tank main I simply refuse to really pick the game back up due to either not having fun relying on my team to do things to constantly being called out for being bad (skill issue) and outside of giving the PvE a shot (review been made before trying it out) I don't know if I will ever fully play the game again.


Also blizzard bad, there I said it.

I think Overwatch 2 is a boring game because it lacks originality and innovation. It is basically a rehash of the first game with some minor changes and updates. The gameplay is repetitive and predictable, the characters are bland and uninteresting, and the story is shallow and clichÃ©. Overwatch 2 does not offer anything new or exciting to the players, and it feels like a cash grab by the developers. I would not recommend this game to anyone who is looking for a fun and engaging experience.

ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.
